name: Loblolly Pine Attic Decking: 8 sq. ft. Coverage, 75 lb. Capacity
description: The OSB Attic Decking 24 in. x 48 in. Attic Decking has an 8 sq. ft. coverage area and a 75 lb. weight capacity. It installs with smooth joints using nails or screws (not included). This attic decking is made of 100% Southern yellow loblolly pine and designed to allow easy passage into your attic space.California residents: see Proposition 65 information8 sq. ft. Coverage area75 lb. Weight capacityMade of 100% pine woodDesigned for fast assembly and smooth jointsInstall for easy passage into attic spaceFasten with nails or screws (sold separately)
